page.title: 08A Scunthorpe Child's views
page.content: Lots of children say they don't get enough{pocket money,}even ones who get 2 or 3 pounds a week. Some don't get set pocket money but most children at this age get about Â£1. Children nowadays tend to like{school although there are quite a few exceptions. The most disliked subjects are Maths and English, the most liked are games and reading. A large number of children think that{TV}is boring because there aren't enough channels. Popular TV programmes are TJ Hooker, Fall Guy and Dukes of Hazzard. One thing children really dislike is{violence.}They think that violence is mainly caused by people out of work. Children's favourite{pastimes}are watching TV and videos, playing outside, going swimming and riding bikes.
